page.title: 20In Misterton
page.content:
Although Misterton is a village it is a sprawling and interesting place. There are about 10 farmers who own most of the fields on which they keep animals or grow crops.There are 9 shops altogether which sell food, sweets, clothes and greengrocery. There are 4 factories, fertilser distribution depot and a petrol dump. There is a factory shop at Corahs where the villagers can buy clothes.
Misterton used to have its own Gas producing works and railway station.
The Community Centre now houses groups such as Guides, Brownies, Scouts, Cubs, Play school and Youth Club.
